channel.title: Need help on changing monsters hp on hybridscape
channel.description: i load up jad and kill him...hit 0 and hes dead...how do i change his hp? :confused: and also i try to pick up fire cape and a noted obby maul comes up...how can i make fire cape wearable.

item.title: Need help on changing monsters hp on hybridscape
item.dc:creator: @i_own_u1 i_own__u
item.description:
@i_own_u1 wrote:

[quote=“carpcatcher, post:1, topic:105915”]Hi, I went into item.java (is this correct file ?) and found public static int capes[] = …6570 was already there, I added it again… but it is still not working and Jad is still ‘0’ HP ?


yes but search again and dont add it by the wrong place[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on changing monsters hp on hybridscape

item.title: Need help on changing monsters hp on hybridscape

item.title: Need help on changing monsters hp on hybridscape
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

For the HP, go into npc.cfg and search for the Jad’s ID - second number in the line is the HP.
The wearable, go to item and add the ID of the fire cape to the line saying public static int capes[] =.
That is what you would do, if I rea your problem right.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on changing monsters hp on hybridscape
